'''Wide Stone Stove''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with the Wide Stone Stove opens the [[Cooking]] menu.
Unlike other items under the ''Tables'' subcategory, it is impossible to place any ornaments on the Wide Stone Stove.

The blueprint for Wide Stone Stove is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Realm of Diversion|Realm of Diversion]] Battle Pass.
